metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45661 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: stb_image is a single file MIT licensed library for processing images. A crafted image file may trigger out of bounds memcpy read in `stbi__gif_load_next`. This happens because two_back points to a memory address lower than the start of the buffer out. This issue may be used to leak internal memory allocation information.

criterions.comment: libstb package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
